name: kawi
description: Kawi is a solid and clean theme for blogs and any other sites. It has clean typography, plenty of white space and puts the emphasis on your content.

scripts.js: npm run babel && npm run eol && npm run uglify
scripts.css: npm run process-css & npm run process-editor-css
scripts.build: npm run css && npm run js && npm run copy

author: Vincent Dubroeucq
